description: Dirichlet convolution of sigma(n) with itself.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..10000
formula: Dirichlet g.f.: zeta^2(x)zeta^2(x-1).Multiplicative with a(2^e) = (n-1) 2^(n+2) + n + 5, a(p^e) = ((1+e)p^(e+3) - (3+e)(p^(e+2)-p-1) + 2)/2, p > 2. - _Mitch Harris_, Jun 27 2005Equals A134577 * A000005. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Nov 02 2007Also the Dirichlet convolution A000005 by A038040. - _R. J. Mathar_, Apr 01 2011
author: _Erich Friedman_
